divs: Sighting DetailsI and my husband was on the way home and it had been raining that day was clouded getting dark i was on my lap top and my husband said what! I look up and all you could see was two huge lights hanging in the air,we were about a mile from it at that time, i said a helicopter kept messing around on laptop.My husband said it not moveing.they he got my attention. we where right at it by this time and notice the huge lights oval shape with rotor blades in front of this craft.This craft was in some cloud's and you just could see it!!!the light's was so bright as i bent my head to see if i could get a better look it turn off it's lights you still could see barely with two small orange lights where the big two oval light was ,then it was gone... this happen on Back Beach RD in Panama City Bch FL
Summary: look like helicopter but wasn't had 2 hugh white oval shape lights in front rotor blades in front .
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Panama City

This sighting has never been favorited.
